users.notes: Password hash recovered but actual password unknown. Password reset required.

password_info.recommendation: Use WordPress password reset feature or wp-cli to set new password

missing_data: Related wp_usermeta records (user capabilities, permissions, etc.)
next_steps: Import this user into a new WordPress database

Check if you have other .ibd files for other WordPress tables
Restore wp_usermeta for full user capabilities
Restore wp_posts, wp_options, and other tables if available
